name: Bubbles Saves Grandma
description:
Oh no! Grandma has taken a bit of a tumble! Take control of Bubbles the Hamster as you tear her house apart looking for her panic button so help can be on the way. There's a pie in the oven, and without grandma's delicate hands, who will feed Bubbles?

"Bubbles Saves Grandma" is somewhere between QWOP and Monkey Ball, and not as elegant as either. 

Attempt to have fun!

Find all the secrets!

Challenge your friends!

Turn the game off and never come back!

Controls

  • W - Move Forward 
  • A/D - Turn 
  • S - Nothing. Bubbles never looks back. 
  • Space - Jump 
  • Escape - Back to menu
  • I’m sorry
